title: Billboard’s Music Industry Events Calendar
description: A complete rundown of the most important events across the music business.
author: Colin Stutz
excerpt: Music industry events calendar: All the festivals, awards, conferences and more across the business.
text: A complete rundown of the most important events across the music business. Events Israel G. The calendar will act as music’s most complete summary major national and international industry events, from conferences to festivals to networking mixers and more. html:
A complete rundown of the most important events across the music business.

As part of our continuing efforts to serve the music industry and its creators, Billboard Pro now features a music industry events calendar for readers.

The calendar will act as music’s most complete summary major national and international industry events, from conferences to festivals to networking mixers and more. Just as Billboard is music’s must-read source for news, charts and analysis, now it also is the go-to for business happenings.

June 2025

  • May 27-July 2 – Blue Note Jazz Festival (New York)
  • June 11-15 – NXNE (Toronto)
  • June 12-14 – Sónar+D (Barcelona)
  • June 12-15 – Bonnaroo Music & Arts Festival (Manchester, Tenn.)
  • June 12-15 – Primavera Sound Porto (Porto, Portugal)
  • June 13-14 – Somewhere Festival & Conference (Wichita, Kans.)
  • June 13-15 – Download Festival (Leicestershire, England)
  • June 14-15 – Parklife Festival (Manchester, England)
  • June 16 – UJA Federation Music Visionary of the Year Award Celebration (New York)
  • June 16-21 – France Music Week (Paris)
  • June 19-21 – Summerfest weekend 1 (Milwaukee, Wis.)
  • June 20 – Hot 97 Summer Jam (Newark, N.J.)
  • June 20-22 – Summer Smash festival (Chicago)
  • June 23-25 – NIVA ’25 Conference (Milwaukee, Wis.)
  • June 25-29 – Glastonbury Festival (Pilton, England)
  • June 26-28 – Summerfest weekend 2 (Milwaukee, Wis.)
  • June 26-July 5 – Festival International de Jazz de Montréal (Montreal)
  • June 28-July 5 – Roskilde Festival (Roskilde, Denmark)
  • June 29-July 1 – NAMM NeXT (Nashville)

July 2025

  • July 3-5 – Summerfest weekend 3 (Milwaukee, Wis.)
  • July 3-6 – Essence Festival of Culture (New Orleans)
  • July 3-13 – Festival d’été de Québec (Québec City, Canada)
  • July 4-19 – Montreux Jazz Festival (Montreux, Switzerland)
  • July 4-22 – Newport Classical Music Festival (Newport, R.I.)
  • July 8-12 – Latin Alternative Music Conference (New York)
  • July 9-11 – Modern Band Summit (Fort Collins, Colo.)
  • July 16 – Pete & Thomas Foundation Gala (New York)
  • July 18-20 – Tomorrowland Weekend 1 (Boom, Belgium)
  • July 19-20 – Create & Cultivate Festival (Los Angeles)
  • July 19-20 – Michelada Fest (Chicago)
  • July 21 – Country Radio Hall of Fame (Nashville)
  • July 25-27 – Tomorrowland Weekend 2 (Boom, Belgium)
  • July 28-Aug. 1 – Record Store Day’s Summer Camp Conference (New Orleans)
  • July 30 – A2IM Indie Week Australian Edition (Adelaide, Australia)
  • July 31-Aug. 1 – Indie-Con Australia (Adelaide, Australia)
  • July 31-Aug. 3 – Lollapalooza (Chicago)

August 2025

  • Aug. 1-3 – Hinterland Music Festival (St. Charles, Iowa)
  • Aug. 1-3 – KCON LA (Los Angeles)
  • Aug. 1-3 – Newport Jazz Festival (Newport, R.I.)
  • Aug. 1-3 – Osheaga Festival (Montreal)
  • Aug. 8-10 – Baja Beach Fest (Rosarito Beach, Mexico)
  • Aug. 8-10 – Outside Lands (San Francisco)
  • Aug. 14-16 – Park City Song Summit (Park City, Utah)
  • Aug. 21-24 – Las Vegas Songwriters Festival (Las Vegas)
  • Aug. 21-24 – Reading & Leeds Festival (Reading and Leeds, England)
  • Aug. 28 – Caribbean Music Awards (New York)
  • Aug. 30-31 – Bumbershoot Arts & Music Festival (Seattle)

September 2025

  • Sept. 7 – MTV Video Music Awards (Elmont, N.Y.)
  • Sept. 9-11 – VenuesNow Conference (Las Vegas)
  • Sept. 9-13 – AMERICANAFEST (Nashville)
  • Sept. 10 – Americana Honors and Awards Show (Nashville)
  • Sept. 11-14 – Bourbon & Beyond festival (Louisville, Ky.)
  • Sept. 13-14 – Four Chord Music Festival (Washington, Pa.)
  • Sept. 14 – Emmy Awards (Los Angeles)
  • Sept. 16-20 – IBMA World of Bluegrass (Chattanooga, Tenn.)
  • Sept. 18 – Black Music Action Coalition (BMAC) Gala (Beverly Hills, Calif.)
  • Sept. 19-20 – iHeartRadio Music Festival (Las Vegas)
  • Sept. 19-20 – Riot Fest (Chicago)
  • Sept. 26-28 – All Things Go Festival (New York & Columbia, Md.)
  • Sept. 26-28 – Monterey Jazz Festival (Monterey, Calif.)
  • Sept. 26-28 – Ohana Festival (Dana Point, Calif.)
  • Sept. 27 – Global Citizen Festival (New York)
  • Sept. 27-28 – Soundside Music Festival (Bridgeport, Conn.)

October 2025

  • Oct. 3-5 – Austin City Limits Music Festival weekend 1 (Austin)
  • Oct. 3-5 – Field & Stream Music Fest (Winnsboro, S.C.)
  • Oct. 5-7 – IEBA 2025 (Nashville)
  • Oct. 7 – GMA Dove Awards (Nashville)
  • Oct. 7-10 –  IMPF Global Music Summit & Songwriting Camp (Palma, Mallorca, Spain)
  • Oct. 8 – Unplugged & Uncorked gala (New York)
  • Oct. 10-12 – Austin City Limits Music Festival weekend 2 (Austin)
  • Oct. 14-16 – WSA Film Music Days (Ghent, Belgium)
  • Oct. 14-17 – Mondo.NYC (New York)
  • Oct. 15 – World Soundtrack Awards (Ghent, Belgium)
  • Oct. 15-18 – Billboard Latin Music Week (Miami)
  • Oct. 17-18 – III Points festival (Miami)
  • Oct. 20-24 – Billboard Latin Music Week (Miami)
  • Oct. 22-23 – NAB Show New York (New York)
  • Oct. 22-26 – Amsterdam Dance Event (Amsterdam)
  • Oct. 23 – Billboard Latin Music Awards (Miami)
  • Oct. 25-26 – ComplexCon (Las Vegas)

November 2025

  • Nov. 1 – Global Citizen Festival: Amazonia (Belém, Brazil)
  • Nov. 4-6 – Music Tectonics (Santa Monica, Calif.)
  • Nov. 9-11 – jump.global Annual Summit (Los Angeles)
  • Nov. 13 – Latin Grammy Awards (Las Vegas)
  • Nov. 14-16 – Corona Capital festival (Mexico City)

January 2026

  • Jan. 11 – Golden Globes (Beverly Hills, Calif.)
  • Jan. 21-25 – Folk Alliance International Conference (New Orleans)

February 2026

  • Feb. 1 – Grammy Awards (Los Angeles)
  • Feb. 28 – PGA Awards

March 2026

  • March 12-18 – SXSW (Austin)
  • March 18-20 – Country Radio Seminar (Nashville)

April 2026

  • April 10-12 – Coachella weekend 1 (Indio, Calif.)
  • April 17-19 – Coachella weekend 2 (Indio, Calif.)
  • April 24-26 – Stagecoach (Indio, Calif.)

Want your event listed? For more information contact joe.maimone@billboard.com.
